content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Yammer is EPAM's enterprise social network. The main purpose of Yammer is to serve as an open, collaborative community for EPAMers where information flows freely, empowering all of us and making us more productive. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM's official language is English, so we strongly recommend the use of English in All Company channel and in groups where colleagues from different locations discuss work-related issues like skills, expertise domains, and so on. You can use other languages in groups intended for a local audience only. Remember to respect each other, don't share information that discloses personal or corporate information that third parties should not have access to, and don't discuss politics and religion as well as topics exploiting sexuality and promoting discrimination and inequality of any kind.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
